alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 10 at 2:00PM MDT until October 11 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH-CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Gregory, Charles Mix, Douglas, Hutchinson, Bon Homme and Yankton. * WINDS...The morning will start off with light southwesterly winds, but after a cold frontal passage in the mid-morning winds will swing around to the West and become sustained 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 22 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Charles Mix; Douglas; Gregory; Hutchinson; Yankton
